[scenario]
clients=client10026;client10027
import=body.txt
actions=end-of-message-reject

[client10026]
port=10026
arguments=--action;reject;--end-of-message-Regexp;Reject

[client10027]
port=10027

[end-of-message-reject]
command=end-of-message
chunk=Reject

response=end-of-message
n_received=2
status=reject
